text: On 14 October 2022, an explosion happened in Amasra coal mine in Amasra, BartÄ±n Province, Turkey. The explosion killed 41 people and injured 11 others. It was one of the deadliest industrial incidents in Turkey. ==References== Category:October 2022 events Category:2022 disasters in Asia Category:2020s explosions in Asia Category:2020s disasters in Turkey Category:Mining disasters
title: Amasra mine explosion
